name: mui-nested-menu
description: Infinitely deep nested menu items for MUI 5.
author: Steve Richardson

scripts.build:package: npm run set-package:build && parcel build --no-optimize --no-source-maps --no-content-hash --target && npm run set-package:dev
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build:package && npm run copy
scripts.publish:minor: npm run prepare && npm version minor && npm run dist && cd ./dist && npm publish  && cd ../../..
scripts.publish:patch: npm run prepare && npm version patch && npm run dist && cd ./dist && npm publish  && cd ../../..
scripts.set-package:build: npx -yes json -I -f package.json -e 'this.module="dist/module.js"' && npx -yes json -I -f package.json -e 'this.types="dist/index.d.ts"'
scripts.set-package:dev: npx -yes json -I -f package.json -e 'this.module="src/index.ts"' && npx -yes json -I -f package.json -e 'this.types="src/index.ts"'
scripts.version:currentpackage: npm pkg set 'version'=$(npm view mui-nested-menu version)
